author: Daniel Newhauser, Christina Sterbenz
title: The Guy Who Helped Invent the N95 Mask Thinks He’s Found a Way to Clean and Reuse Them
description: “We should get the results in one or two days.”
content:

 Hospitals are scrambling to sterilize and reuse N95 masks, deploying high-tech methods like ultraviolet light or concentrated hydrogen peroxide. But the father of the modern N95 mask thinks a … [+5293 chars]
